com.topcoder.service.user
Interface UserServiceLocal

All Superinterfaces:
UserService
All Known Implementing Classes:
UserServiceBean
public interface UserServiceLocal
extends UserService

This is the local interface for EJB 3.0 bean. It is a marker interface which simply extends the UserService contract. It allows the UserService to also be accessed as a local bean.

Implementations will simply need to implement the base contract - UserService. The marker interface itself requires no special implementation.

Thread Safety: Implementations must be thread safe.

Since:
Cockpit Release Assembly for Receipts
Version:
1.0
Author:
snow01

Methods inherited from interface com.topcoder.service.user.UserService
getEmailAddress, getEmailAddress, getUserHandle, getUserId, isAdmin
